Posts.Content: an1245 wrote: Hello All, I am 28 and have been diagnosed with breast cancer. I don't have kids but plan to get pregnant some time in future. I was wondering if any of the folks on this forum can share if pregnancy is possible after going through chemo. If I have to go through chemo what steps can I take to ensure that I don't loose my fertility. I would be glad if some one can share their experience. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: chemo and pregnancy an1245 jpmercy
